tool_description: Retrieves complete journal entries by their IDs, with options for formatting and content filtering.

entry_ids.description: List of entry IDs to retrieve

include_metadata.description: Whether to include entry metadata (date, tags, mood, etc.)

format_output.description: Whether to format text for better readability

exclude_private.description: Whether to exclude entries marked as private

error_messages: Invalid entry IDs: One or more entry IDs do not exist or are malformed
Too many entries: Maximum 50 entries can be retrieved at once
Access denied: Some entries are private or restricted
Empty entry_ids: At least one entry ID must be provided
usage: Provide entry_ids array and configure retrieval options. Use include_metadata for complete entry information.

entries.description: Complete text content of retrieved journal entries

entry_dates.description: Creation dates for each retrieved entry

failed_retrievals.description: List of entry IDs that could not be retrieved
